rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DS.DSSPID

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined reference number. Perhaps preprinted on the CRF as an explicit line identifier or defined in the sponsor's operational database. Example: Line number on a Disposition page.
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor-Defined Identifier
datasetVariables.name: DSSPID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

priorVersion.title: Reported Term for the Disposition Event

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DS.DSTERM

self.title: Reported Term for the Disposition Event

datasetVariables.description: Verbatim name of the event or protocol milestone. Some terms in DSTERM will match DSDECOD, but others, such as "Subject moved" will map to controlled terminology in DSDECOD, such as "LOST TO FOLLOW-UP".
datasetVariables.label: Reported Term for the Disposition Event
datasetVariables.name: DSTERM

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C114118
Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66727

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DS.DSDECOD

datasetVariables.description: Controlled terminology for the name of disposition event or protocol milestone. Examples of protocol milestones: "INFORMED CONSENT OBTAINED", "RANDOMIZED". There are separate codelists used for DSDECOD where the choice depends on the value of DSCAT. Codelist "NCOMPLT" is used for disposition events and codelist "PROTMLST" is used for protocol milestones. The variable may be subject to controlled terminology for other events.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Disposition Term
datasetVariables.name: DSDECOD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C74558

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

datasetVariables.name: DSCAT

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DS.DSSCAT

datasetVariables.description: A further categorization of DSCAT (e.g., "STUDY PARTICIPATION", "STUDY TREATMENT" when DSCAT = "DISPOSITION EVENT").
datasetVariables.label: Subcategory for Disposition Event
datasetVariables.name: DSSCAT
